Hmmmm JAPAAAAAN JAAPAAAAAAN. JESUS CHRIST JAPAN.

topics.body:
>Using Illustrator for the first time
>Project re-creating cityscape silhouettes using shapes
>Hey look I literally do this kind of thing in Black Ops 2 already this should be easy
>Given three days to finish it, more than halfway done with it by the middle of class time
>Need to make a curve for one of the buildings
>"I'll make an arc line and then fill it in"
>Arc turns out quite well, but I can't find the paint bucket tool
>Ask teacher
>"Look under the gradient tool"
>There's no drop down menu, the gradient tool doesn't have any other options
>"Change the format from 'Essentials' to 'Like Photoshop'"
>Illustrator crashes, didn't save
>Goddammit
>mfw
!http://i.imgur.com/pl85MBE.gif!
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
